column9: do you support the city of portland creating a new office to regulate air pollution?
column10: do you support repealing the 48 hour rule, which allows police to not answer questions about an incident for 48 hours after using force?
column11: do you support immediate freeze on rent prices in portland?
column12: do you support allowing homeless families to live in temporary tent communities?
column13: do you believe in using congestion fees to improve commutes and public transit?
